diff_hunk:
@@ -64,10 +79,11 @@ def mkl_tmp(name):
             core.DeviceOption(device_type=device))
         op.engine = ""
 
-    # Fuse Conv-Relu for IDEEP
     if ideep:
-        net.ParseFromString(
-            C.transform_optimizeForIDEEP(net.SerializeToString()))
+        # Temporarily disbale conv+relu fusion until we verify further
body: Convfusion op is less tested and last time I bench it, it didn't give much improvement. And I'm not sure all the fixes that goes in to Conv op was ported to Convfusion yet. We can enable it later once we are satisfied with the basic flow.
